/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are tall and modern, their facades adorned with balconies and windows that reflect the clear blue sky above. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the right side of the street, a blue sign stands out, although the text on it is not visible in the image. The sky above is a vibrant blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape below.
